text: Ben Coates (born August 16, 1969 in Greenwood, South Carolina) is an American former professional football tight end. He played a total of 10 seasons in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the New England Patriots and Baltimore Ravens. He won Super Bowl XXXV with the Ravens in 2000.Coates was inducted into the New England Patriots Hall of Fame in 2008. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:New England Patriots players
title: Ben Coates
